lead_paragraph: If Jed Ortmeyer needed any reminder of how far he has come this season, he received it Saturday the instant he slid a penalty shot past Boston goalie Tim Thomas and sealed a victory over the Bruins.
snippet: If Jed Ortmeyer needed any reminder of how far he has come this season, he received it Saturday the instant he slid a penalty shot past Boston goalie Tim Thomas and sealed a victory over the Bruins.
